public class ReadFromDB

Author:
kesslewd Reads a matrix, vector or lines from the calculation table of a database.

public void readMatrix(Reader.InformationType type)
Method readMatrix. Reads a matrix of data. Afterwards use nextRow to position the cursor on the first row. Then use nextValue to get the first value.

type - Type of information to read.
